page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: I wake up at 6.30 and got into the bathroom where I wash and brush my teeth. Then I get dresses (My school uniform is a blue blazer, tie, shirt, trousers and black or grey shoes). Then I have breakfast - a bowl of cereal, milk and fruit juice, and some pieces of toast. I go to school on the bus. I have seven lessons each day: from Maths, physics, Latin, french, Art, Music, English, Geography, History, Biology and Religion. We also have games and physical education. We get a break of fifteen minutes and a lunch break of seventy five minutes. School starts at 9.10 a.m. and finishes at 4.05 p.m. After playing on my computer and doing my homework I go to bed at about 9.30 p.m. My favourite food is curry, drink is Coke, and I love apple pie and custard.
